nodes.text: Tru Veld was a Jedi who at some point before 3 ABY, caused an incident at the Jedi Temple's reflecting pond with fireworks, which cracked Jedi Master Yoda. Obi-Wan Kenobi later recalled the incident when on Dagobah, when he noted that Luke Skywalker had caused Yoda to become frustrated, adding that Luke's father, Anakin Skywalker, had rarely cracked Yoda before finishing that the only time he could remember was the incident with Veld.
